sentences.en: A lone Atlantic walrus rests on what looks to be an undersized ice floe amid a glassy sea in Canada's Foxe Basin.
sentences.cn: 在加拿大福克斯湾平静的海面，一头孤独的大西洋海象在一块较小的浮冰上休息。

sentences.en: Ice floe distribution in the Sea of Okhotsk in the period when sea - ice extent is advancing.
sentences.cn: 当海冰范围提升时Okhotsk海里浮冰分布.

sentences.en: Two crew members parachuted on to a larger floe, and then crawled on their bellies to reach him.
sentences.cn: 两名搜救成员用降落伞落到一块更大的浮冰上，然后匍匐着去够他。

sentences.en: Two penguins are standing on ice floe.
sentences.cn: 两只企鹅站在一块浮冰上.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 冰川；大浮冰；小冰原
